name: Cranberry Butter Pecan Pie
description:
Absolutely delicious Cranberry Butter Pecan Pie, runner-up in a competition between Dutch&Belgian mixers organized by Lynn who runs a FB page (Reviews 评论 Just a 只是 Lady 女士) that reviews commercial juices on a daily base. Interested? have a look at https://www.facebook.com/groups/726584030815474/
______________________________________________________

For the pie base is used FA Apple Pie mixed with WF Butter Pecan Pie.
I love the filling made of FLV Cranberry and FA Custard Premium.
Finished this simple but moist and delicious mix with some FLV Sweetness.

Enjoy
author: besejuiced
